# creatingFixedGroup()

**Instance Method**

Places the item in a fixed group that a person can’t move or remove from the navigation bar during layout customization.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func creatingFixedGroup() -> UIBarButtonItemGroup
```

## Return Value

A [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarButtonItemGroup] that contains only this bar button item.

## Discussion

A bar button item can only belong to one [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarButtonItemGroup]. If you add a bar button item to a new group, the system removes it from its previous group.

## Creating groups

- **creatingOptionalGroup(customizationIdentifier:isInDefaultCustomization:)**: Places the item in an optional group that a person can move, add to, or remove from the navigation bar during layout customization.
- **creatingMovableGroup(customizationIdentifier:)**: Places the item in a movable group that a person can move but can’t remove from the navigation bar during layout customization.
